name: 英語歌謠與韻文
description: 本課程將介紹英語歌謠與韻文的種類及其於教學之應用。課程內容包含各類英語歌謠與韻文的賞析、教學設計及創作。學生需研讀相關文獻資料、參與主題討論、報告及試教，並將所學運用於創作英語歌謠與韻文
goals: 瞭解各類英語歌謠與韻文的內容、背景及教學方式。
在實際教學演練中，有效運用英語歌謠與韻文，並設計適當的教具與活動。
發揮創意，結合多元文化，創作英語歌謠或韻文。
syllabus:
**CourseDescription:**

The course aims to introducevarious types of English songs and rhymes, and how they can be applied indifferent pedagogical settings. The content of the course includes not only theappreciation and creation of English songs and rhymes, but also the design ofrelevant educational activities. In addition to studying related literature,participating in discussion, and conducting mock lessons, each student will berequired to create at least one English song/rhyme by the end of the course.
